audio_analysis_audio_text_sync: Is the audio meaningfully synced/aligned with on-screen text?
audio_analysis_audio_type: Primary audio type (voiceover, dialogue, music-only, ambient, silent, mixed).
audio_analysis_music_style: Music style (upbeat, calm, dramatic, trending sound, none).
audio_analysis_music_tempo: Music tempo (slow, medium, fast, variable, none).
audio_analysis_sound_on_dependency: How required audio is to understand the message (required, enhanced, optional, none).
audio_analysis_voiceover_style: Voiceover style (professional, casual, enthusiastic, ASMR, none).
axis_AccessibilityInclusion: Axis: accessibility and inclusion (captions, readability, inclusive representation).
axis_BehavioralFriction: Axis: behavioral friction (steps, effort, confusion, barriers to action).
axis_BehavioralPsychology: Axis: behavioral psychology usage (nudges, motivation, habit triggers).
axis_CognitiveBiases: Axis: cognitive bias usage (social proof, loss aversion, anchoring, etc.).
axis_CognitiveLoad: Axis: cognitive load (information density, complexity, mental effort required).
axis_ConsumerTimelineLifeEvents: Axis: consumer timeline/life-events relevance (moving, graduation, new job, etc.).
axis_ContentArchetypesFormats: Axis: content archetype/format strength (UGC, tutorial, listicle, etc.).
axis_ConversionMechanics: Axis: conversion mechanics (CTA strength, offer clarity, urgency, friction reduction).
axis_CrossModalAlignment: Axis: alignment across modalities (visual, text, audio convey same message).
axis_CustomAxis_SocialProof: Axis: custom social proof emphasis (reviews, stats, user counts).
axis_DataDrivenInsights: Axis: data-driven messaging (numbers, benchmarks, measurable claims).
axis_EmotionalMindsetCategory: Axis: emotional mindset category targeted (security, status, belonging, etc.).
axis_EmotionalMindsetThemes: Axis: emotional mindset themes used (confidence, relief, excitement, etc.).
axis_FunnelStageOptimization: Axis: funnel-stage optimization (awareness vs consideration vs conversion).
axis_MicroCommitments: Axis: micro-commitment progression (small steps leading to conversion).
axis_PlatformNativeOptimization: Axis: platform-native optimization (format norms, pacing, UI patterns).
axis_ProductionQualitySignals: Axis: production quality signals (polish, lighting, clarity, editing).
axis_PsychologicalDistance: Axis: psychological distance (here/now vs abstract/future; personal relevance).
axis_SeasonalCulturalTriggers: Axis: seasonal/cultural triggers (festivals, holidays, cultural moments).
axis_SeasonalCulturalTriggersCategory: Axis: category of seasonal/cultural trigger (holiday, event, trend).
axis_SensoryPerceptual: Axis: sensory/perceptual pull (visual pop, sound texture, tactile cues).
axis_SensoryPerceptualDesign: Axis: sensory design execution (contrast, rhythm, cues that guide attention).
axis_StrategicIntent: Axis: strategic intent (sell now vs educate vs brand building vs retention).
axis_TrendBasedViralFormats: Axis: trend/viral format usage (memes, templates, trending edits/sounds).
axis_TrendLifecyclePositioning: Axis: trend lifecycle position (early, rising, peak, declining).
axis_TrustVelocity: Axis: speed of trust-building (how quickly credibility is established).
brand_business_brand_integration: How the brand is integrated (logo, product usage, brand colors, etc.).
brand_business_industry_vertical: Industry category represented (fashion, tech, health, etc.).
brand_business_price_positioning: Price positioning signal (premium, affordable, value, etc.).
brand_business_purchase_intent_stage: Funnel stage targeted (awareness, consideration, conversion, retention).
brand_business_target_audience_signal: Apparent target audience signal (gen z, millennial, professional, niche, etc.).
content_theme_emotional_tone: Overall emotional tone (excited, calm, urgent, humorous, serious, etc.).
content_theme_key_benefit_focus: Primary benefit emphasized (time, money, quality, ease, results, etc.).
content_theme_narrative_style: Narrative approach (first-person, second-person, documentary, none, etc.).
content_theme_primary_theme: Primary theme (transformation, convenience, luxury, value, health, etc.).
content_theme_social_context: Social context shown (individual, family, friends, crowd, none).
content_theme_story_arc: Story structure (problem-solution, transformation, demo, testimonial, none).
context_contextualTagsByBusiness: Context: business-specific contextual tags (industry or offer context).
context_culturalRelevance: Context: cultural relevance markers (local cues, references, moments).
context_platformSpecificFeatures: Context: platform-specific UI/features leveraged (e.g., sticker, duet, CTA button).
context_targetAudienceTraits: Context: implied audience traits (behaviors, preferences, identity cues).
copy_analysis_copy_tone: Overall copy tone (casual, professional, urgent, friendly, authoritative).
copy_analysis_headline_length: Headline length bucket (short, medium, long, none).
copy_analysis_headline_type: Headline/hook type (question, statement, command, number, how_to, none).
copy_analysis_message_clarity: Overall message clarity (unclear, moderate, clear, very_clear).
copy_analysis_text_readability: On-screen text readability (poor, adequate, good, excellent).
copywriting_action: Copywriting primitive: action (clear action verb / directive).
copywriting_advantage: Copywriting primitive: advantage (why this is better).
copywriting_bridge: Copywriting primitive: bridge (how to get from before to after).
copywriting_complication: Copywriting primitive: complication (tension/obstacle that needs resolving).
copywriting_picture: Copywriting primitive: picture (vivid imagery / paint the scene).
copywriting_push: Copywriting primitive: push (urgency/nudge to act now).
core_attributes_content_category: Primary content category (product, lifestyle, educational, testimonial, etc.).
core_attributes_cta_placement: When the CTA appears (early, middle, end, throughout, none).
core_attributes_cta_type: CTA type (shop_now, learn_more, sign_up, download, subscribe, etc.).
core_attributes_cut_frequency: How often cuts occur (none, low, medium, high, very_high).
core_attributes_hook_type: Opening hook type (question, statistic, shock, curiosity, problem, benefit, etc.).
core_attributes_primary_platform: Target platform (tiktok, instagram reels/feed, facebook, youtube, multi).
core_attributes_text_amount: Amount of on-screen text (none, minimal, moderate, heavy).
entity_peopleDemographics: Entity extraction: people/demographic cues (age range, gender mix, etc.).
first_frame_first_3s_hook_strength: Hook strength in first 3 seconds (weak, moderate, strong, very_strong).
first_frame_first_frame_color_pop: Eye-catching color pop in first frame (True/False).
first_frame_first_frame_content: Primary first-frame content (face, product, text, scene, action, question).
first_frame_first_frame_emotion: First-frame emotional trigger (curiosity, surprise, desire, fear, neutral).
presence_ctaStyle: Presence: CTA style/type (button, text, overlay, verbal, etc.).
presence_hook: Presence: hook exists (opening pattern that grabs attention) (True/False).
presence_interactivity: Presence: interactive elements used (polls, stickers, replies, etc.).
presence_isCtaAvailable: Presence: CTA is available/visible to user (True/False).
presence_logoPlacement: Presence: where logo appears (intro, corner, end-card, product, etc.).
presence_objects: Presence: notable objects detected (props, tools, devices, etc.).
presence_offerPromotion: Presence: offer/promo details (discount, bonus, bundle, freebie).
visual_backgroundElements: Visual: background elements complexity/type (plain, room, outdoors, cluttered, etc.).
visual_cameraMovement: Visual: camera movement type (static, handheld, pan, zoom, tracking, etc.).
visual_editingStyle: Visual: editing style (cuts, fades, kinetic text, montage, etc.).
visual_lightingStyle: Visual: lighting style (natural, studio, ring light, dramatic, mixed).
visual_shotType: Visual: shot type (close-up, medium, wide, POV, mixed).
visual_style_camera_angle: Primary camera angle (eye_level, high_angle, low_angle, overhead, dutch, pov).
visual_style_camera_movement: Primary camera movement (static, handheld, dolly, pan, zoom, tracking, mixed).
visual_style_color_saturation: Color saturation level (desaturated, normal, saturated, vivid).
visual_style_color_scheme: Dominant color scheme (warm, cool, neutral, vibrant, muted, monochrome, brand_colors).
visual_style_framing_style: Framing approach (centered, rule_of_thirds, symmetrical, dynamic, tight).
visual_style_lighting_type: Lighting type (natural, studio, ring_light, dramatic, low_key, high_key, mixed).
visual_style_safe_zone_compliance: Key elements kept within safe zones (True/False).
visual_style_shot_composition: Primary shot composition (closeup, medium, wide, extreme_closeup, full_body, mixed).
visual_style_text_style: On-screen text style (none, simple, bold, handwritten, kinetic, branded).
visual_style_thumbnail_appeal: Thumbnail/first frame appeal (low, medium, high, very_high).
visual_style_transition_style: Primary transition style (cut, fade, dissolve, swipe, zoom, creative).
visual_style_visual_hierarchy: Clarity of visual hierarchy (unclear, moderate, clear).
visual_style_visual_style: Overall visual style (ugc, polished, cinematic, minimalist, colorful, etc.).
visual_textOverlayStyle: Visual: text overlay styling (simple, bold, handwritten, kinetic, branded, etc.).
visual_vfx: Visual: VFX/animated effects usage (none, light, heavy).
visual_visualThemes: Visual: high-level visual themes (luxury, minimal, outdoors, techy, etc.).
